item.title: ✍️ Prescriptions
item.description: If one needs a prescription for a medicine in Poland the fastests way could be one of these special services. Prices vary, but one could expect them to be 50–100 PLN. There are no guarantees, as well, but in case of a refusal refunds are available. https://receptozaur.pl (cheaper, full refunds) https://receptomat.pl (pricier, with 10 PLN non-refundable fee)
